headline: Citigroup (C) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of global financial services giant Citigroup (NYSE:C) jumped 3.1% in the afternoon session after the broader market rallied on renewed hopes for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, fueled by favorable inflation data and an extension of the U.S.-China trade truce. The surge was part of a significant market-wide upswing, with major indices reaching for all-time highs as investors grew more confident in a potential "soft landing" for the economy, where inflation is controlled without a major

headline: Citigroup (C) Partners With Payoneer For Real-Time Blockchain Treasury Transfers
summary: Citigroup's recent collaboration with Payoneer to introduce real-time blockchain-enabled treasury transfers marks a significant advance, reflecting the company's ongoing commitment to fintech innovation. Over the last quarter, Citigroup (C) saw a 22% increase in share price, a notable performance in the context of a rising market. Contributing to this uplift, the partnership with Payoneer enhances global liquidity and treasury efficiency, while the company's reported quarterly dividend...

headline: 3 reasons Citi lifted its year-end S&P 500 target
summary: Citi analysts lifted their S&P 500 (^GSPC) year-end target to 6,600 from 6,300, among Wall Street's highest estimates. The firm states that "better earnings trigger target reset." Citi's head of US equity strategy, Scott Chronert, joins Market Catalysts to explain what drove the firm to lift its target. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Is Citigroup (C) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Citigroup (C) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Payoneer Leverages Citi's Blockchain Technology to Enable 24/7 Global Intracompany Money Transfers
summary: Payoneer (NASDAQ: PAYO), the global financial technology company powering business growth across borders, today announced a collaboration with Citi to launch real-time, blockchain-enabled treasury transfers via Citi® Token Services, the firm's tokenized liquidity and payment platform. This new capability enables Payoneer to transfer funds between its global accounts in participating branches and currencies with greater speed, automation and transparency.

headline: Why Citi's Baldwin Is 'Still Risk On' in US Equities
summary: Lucy Baldwin, global head of research at Citi, sees "resilience, rather than any kind of irrational exuberance" in US markets, despite what she calls a "massive debate" about the health of the US economy moving into next year.

headline: Citigroup Appoints Dhakad to Head North America Private Credit
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is among the best holding company stocks to invest in.
